title: Over 280,000 WordPress sites may have been hijacked by zero-day hiding in popular plugin
description: Over 280,000 WordPress sites may have been taken over thanks to zero-day in popular plugin.

title: Leak suggests Intel's new Xeon CPUs suffer from more than just delays
description: Leaked data suggests Intel’s new Xeon chips fail to match the level of performance available elsewhere.

title: Nvidia RTX 4060: everything we know about Nvidia's next-gen 'budget' graphics card
description: The Nvidia RTX 4060 may be released as soon as 2023, but what do we know about it so far?

title: The Linux Foundation wants to tackle digital wallets next
description: Linux’s newly-announced OpenWallet Foundation hopes to provide interoperable OSS for the digital wallet.

title: Microsoft 365 apps will now update themselves as if by magic
description: Microsoft 365 updates will now install even when your device is powered down.

title: Google Photos update is set to transform your Memories
description: Rolling out to users today, some of the changes include a collage editing tool and improved cinematic photos.

title: PS5 console exclusive Deathloop has appeared on the Xbox Series X
description: Arkane's FPS Deathloop looks set to jump over to Xbox consoles soon.

title: Nvidia RTX 4070 may not show up this year – but the replacement GPU could surprise you

description: Microsoft Edge Secure Network VPN controls appear for some users.

title: Nokia’s new phone is like a 3310 with earbuds built into the back – and I love it
description: Nokia's 5710 XpressAudio phone has FM radio and built-in Bluetooth earbuds for an oddly futuristic-but-retro experience.

title: McAfee is combining all your most-needed security products into one package
description: McAfee+ wants to make cybersecurity simple, whether you're alone or with your family.

title: Linux users can now secure their data with this leading VPN

title: Microsoft just fixed a whole load of serious security flaws, so patch now

description: The iOS 16 update for iPhone finally puts key AirPods settings just a tap away… but there's more customization access that we want.

title: Phishing attackers are now using multiple email accounts to start group conversations with you
description: Hackers are dragging victims into fake email conversations to lure them into downloading malware.

title: Nvidia RTX 4090 GPU appears in another photo, suggesting launch is imminent

title: The iPhone 14 Pro's best feature can be turned into a game

title: Not even Cobra Kai can cancel out Netflix's current dry spell

title: A hit Xbox Game Pass adventure game is coming to Nintendo Switch and PS5
